text: Arthur Skinner (24 May 1919 - 18 February 1993) was a British sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre rifle, prone event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:1993 deaths Category:British male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Great Britain Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Ampthill
title: Arthur Skinner (sport shooter)
